abstract: Closing arguments are heard in trial of New York State Sen Thomas W Libous, who is accused of lying to FBI agents about arranging job for his son at law firm.
lead_paragraph: A prosecutor accuses Thomas W. Libous, a high-ranking Republican legislator from the Binghamton area, of telling “knowing lies” to the F.B.I. during a corruption investigation.

headline.main: Jurors Get Case in Trial of New York State Senator Thomas Libous
headline.print_headline: Jurors Get Case in U.S. Trial of a New York State Senator

snippet: A prosecutor accuses Thomas W. Libous, a high-ranking Republican legislator from the Binghamton area, of telling “knowing lies” to the F.B.I. during a corruption investigation.
